 2018-07432018-06-13NRCAN,  ,  ,  , 
ActNuclear Safety and Control Act
PrecisAppointment of RUMINA VELSHI of Toronto, Ontario, to be a full-time permanent member of the Canadian Nuclear Safety Commission, to hold office during good behaviour for a term of five years; and her designation as President of the Canadian Nuclear Safety Commission, effective August 22, 2018.
